summary: A test suite that validates the image processing component used with Deformable DETR models, checking correct handling of COCO detection and panoptic annotations, dictionary-based configuration, property exposure, and integration with PyTorch inference.
business_intent: Ensure the Deformable DETR image preprocessing pipeline works reliably with standard COCO annotation formats and PyTorch, providing confidence that model inputs are correctly prepared for training and inference.
